short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save text clips from websites as Notes in a Collection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickPaste is a free and lightweight Chrome extension that simplifies your copy-pasting experience by providing a very quick and easy way to save and access frequently used snippets of text . 
Once installed, QuickPaste adds a context menu option to Chrome that allows you to save any selected text to your QuickPaste Collection. 
You can then quickly access your saved snippets at any time by clicking the QuickPaste icon in your browser's toolbar or by pressing CTRL+Q or Command+Q. You can also go into your QuickPaste Collections page and see all of your snippets, and choose what you want to keep and what you want to delete.
It also features a button to redirect you to the webpage the text clip was saved from, and notifications for when your text is saved, which can be turned off from the options page.
